poem:
Title: "Upon a Perilous Reel"

In the birth of dawn, an eco-story unreels,
Beside the ghost-gum trees and spectral veils.
Pipeline's prose in steel, Xochitl futilely feels,
Echoing whispers 'gainst corporate tales.
Angry, she fights; her hope, climate regret heals,
Amid the tinder-dry bush and eucalypts' snares.
Overlooked and raw, the screen truth reveals,
Her courage stirs the outback, the world bears.
